summary: adds a new mine near Riverwood
descriptionHtml:
Adds a new mine near Riverwood.
A story about an adventurer who ventured inside and never saw daylight again.
There are some spiders in the mine, some ore to mine, a dead guy, a book, and a magic elk.
The dead guy has been there for a long time. Once he discovered the magic elk all the power he could get from it he went crazy.
And believed that the mine was a beast, and that he was swallowed inside it.

Feedback would be appreciated


Not compatible with anything  that adds anything to the location where the mine is
Not compatible with uchiha mod and Naruto overhaul (jutsu lair)

Manual Installation: Download and install [url=http://www.7-zip.org/][u][color=#0066cc]7zip[/color][/u][/url]. Once you have downloaded the mod, open the archive .rar with 7zip, and click extract. Extract the files so that the file are in the Skyrim data folder
author: Mattaaa
